Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog

Class CourseCatalog

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog.CourseCatalog
public class CourseCatalog extends Object
This class is responsible for maintaining a catalog of courses.
Author:
Jeremiah Knizley

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CourseCatalog()
    Constructs the catalog as an empty SortedList of courses

  • Method Details

    • newCourseCatalog

      public void newCourseCatalog()
      creates a new course catalog as an empty SortedList of courses

    • loadCoursesFromFile

      public void loadCoursesFromFile(String fileName)
      Loads courses into the catalog from a CSV file
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file where the CSV list of courses are

    • addCourseToCatalog

      public boolean addCourseToCatalog(String name, String title, String section, int credits, String instructorId, String meetingDays, int startTime, int endTime) throws IllegalArgumentException
      adds a course to the course catalog
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the course
      title - the title of the course
      section - the section of the course
      credits - the number of credits the course gives
      instructorId - the ID of the instructor teaching the course
      meetingDays - the days the course meets for class (if applicable)
      startTime - start time of class meetings in military time
      endTime - the end time of class meetings in military time
      Returns:
      boolean true if successfully added, false if not.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • removeCourseFromCatalog

      public boolean removeCourseFromCatalog(String name, String section)
      Removes a course from the catalog
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the course to be removed
      section - the section of the course to be removed
      Returns:
      boolean true if successfully removed, false if there was nothing to remove

    • getCourseFromCatalog

      public Course getCourseFromCatalog(String name, String section)
      Returns the specified course from the catalog
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the course to be returned
      section - the section of the course to be returned
      Returns:
      the course requested, or null if the course is not in the catalog

    • getCourseCatalog

      public String[][] getCourseCatalog()
      Returns a 2D array containing information for all courses in the catalog. Information in the array is (for each course): name, section, title, meeting info.
      Returns:
      a 2d array containing information for all courses in the catalog

    • saveCourseCatalog

      public void saveCourseCatalog(String fileName)
      Writes the full catalog of courses in toString format to a text file with the given file name
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file to write to
